author: Adam Smith
title: White Wolf bringing Werewolf: The Apocalypse to PC
text:
When Paradox bought World of Darkness creators/publishers White Wolf back in 2015 , I immediately started thinking of the games they’d make. A Vampire: The Masquerade grand strategy game along with a sequel to RPS favourite Bloodlines perhaps? Or how about those Werewolves? Well, today White Wolf have announced a Werewolf: The Apocalypse game, but it’s to be published by Focus and developed by Cyanide, who are currently working on a Call of Cthulhu game. We’ll learn more about both games early next month, but the few Werewolf details already available are below.
